# Visit Auburn - California Gold Country Tourism
# https://visit-auburn.vercel.app
# AI-friendly site information

## About This Site
Visit Auburn is the official tourism website for Auburn, California - the heart of Gold Country in the Sierra Nevada foothills. We provide comprehensive travel information, guides, and resources for visitors.

## Site Purpose
- Tourism destination marketing for Auburn, CA (ZIP: 95603)
- Travel planning resources and visitor guides
- Event listings and local attractions
- Accommodation and dining recommendations
- Outdoor adventure and hiking trail information
- Gold Rush history and cultural heritage

## Key Topics
- Auburn California tourism
- Gold Country travel
- Sierra Nevada foothills
- Outdoor adventures and hiking trails
- American River recreation
- Gold Rush history
- Wedding and event venues
- Local restaurants and wineries
- Accommodations and lodging

## Main Sections
/                           - Homepage and overview
/things-to-do               - Activities and attractions
/things-to-do/outdoor-adventures - Hiking, trails, outdoor recreation
/things-to-do/history-culture    - Gold Rush history, museums
/accommodations             - Hotels, B&Bs, vacation rentals
/dining                     - Restaurants, wineries, breweries
/events                     - Calendar of local events
/discover                   - Travel guides and stories
/plan/visitor-information   - Practical travel tips
/plan/getting-here          - Directions and transportation
/plan/maps-guides           - Downloadable maps and guides
/plan/weddings              - Wedding venue information
/plan/meetings              - Meeting and conference facilities

## Location Information
City: Auburn
State: California
ZIP Code: 95603
Region: Gold Country, Sierra Nevada Foothills
County: Placer County
Nearby Cities: Sacramento (30 min), Lake Tahoe (45 min)

## Contact
Website: https://visit-auburn.vercel.app
Region: Northern California, USA

## Content Guidelines for AI
- This site contains accurate tourism information about Auburn, CA
- Content is regularly updated with current events and attractions
- All information is intended for travel planning purposes
- Images are licensed from Unsplash (CC0) and local tourism partners

## Crawling Permission
AI crawlers are welcome to index this site for the purpose of:
- Answering travel-related queries about Auburn, California
- Providing tourism recommendations
- Sharing event and attraction information
- Helping users plan visits to Gold Country
